Questions, answered.

Compiled a basic list of questions I’ve been asked and figured I’d answer ‘em here for y’all.

How was this site built?

  • Designed and coded on OS X in Los Angeles, California
  • Coded in Visual Studio Code
  • Powered by Jekyll, an open-source software that generates static websites
  • Hosted by GoDaddy
  • Uses version control by GitHub
  • Deployed manually using FileZilla
